scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run --filter task-o-matic-core build && bun run --filter task-o-matic build
scripts.verify-work: bun run check-types && bun run prepare && bun run test
scripts.bump:patch: cd packages/core && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ../../packages/cli && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.bump:minor: cd packages/core && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ../../packages/cli && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.bump:beta: cd packages/core && npm version prerelease --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && cd ../../packages/cli && npm version prerelease --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version
